name: Petz Hamster Superstar
synopsis: Adopt your very own family of hamsters! Care for them, teach them fun tricks, and unlock toys and accessories to give them lots of love! • Care for your hamsters by feeding them, playing with them and keeping them clean. • Discover your hamsters’ unique personalities—watch them react with their cute and funny facial expressions! • Teach your hamsters fun activities such as bowling or running on ramps, and watch them progress. • Earn coins you can spend at the store to unlock new toys and accessories. Please note that elements of this software may have been featured in previously released software.
